      • testAndImplementCastling

        public static boolean testAndImplementCastling(int currRow,
                                               int currCol,
                                               int tarRow,
                                               int tarCol)
        Parameters:
        currRow - the row that the current piece is on
        currCol - the column that the current piece is on
        tarRow - the row that the current piece wants to move on
        tarCol - the column that the current piece wants to move on
        Returns:
        boolean true or false whether the user is attempting the castling and whether or not the castling was successful

        currCol - the column that the current piece is on
